Venture capital funding

We are champions of business growth and adept at fostering innovation. Our access to capital and history of building and managing businesses from the ground up positions us uniquely. We can invest capital as a financial investment and leverage our expertise to enhance returns. As experts in technology and operations we target companies in industries where a slight technological advantage can yield a large advantage operationally. We are hands on and recognize it’s important to play an active role in an investment to have the greatest prospects for success.

  • Seed and Early Stage Funding
  • Technology and Value Added Services Enterprises
  • Typical Investments Range from 100,000$ - 5,000,000$
  • Long Term Investment Horizon
  • Entrepreneur Mentoring and Management Expertise
